title.rendered: SHOP THE NEW CRYSTAL FASHION TREND

content.rendered:
SHOP THE NEW CRYSTAL FASHION TREND

I’m loving the new and improved modern crystal fashion trend featuring Alexander Wang. This trend is perfect to incorporate into your accessories for edgier yet toned down classic look. Alexander Wags has been killing it with beautiful shoes and iconic crystals bags that are selling out everywhere. If you’re a minimalist but still love this trend you can add delicate crystal hairpins to your look. Or go big with oversized crystal earrings whole keeping the rest of your look clean and simple.

1: White dress with crystals look is from FWRD.COM 2: Both crystal bags are Alexander Wang. 3: Top shoes are Alexander Wang FWRD.COM . 4: Bottom black shoes are Manolo Blahnik FWRD.COM . 5: Crystal hairpins available on FWRD.COM or Revolve.com or Nordstrom.com. 6: Crystal Earrings are from FWRD.COM 

P.S. Book your lash appointments early! Get celebrity favorite Lash Extensions from D’Lashes. For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). 3: Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

 

LOVE DIONNE
